data.message: Build Decision Closure System: validate_decision append-only history + duro_review_decision + duro_review_next_decisions: Shipped 3 commits: (1) decision_validation artifact type with full schema/embedding/indexing, (2) duro_review_decision with context pack + review template + soft guardrails, (3) duro_review_next_decisions convenience tool. Tested with 3 real decisions: orchestration, duro persistence, policy enforcement - all validated with history recorded.
